items.title: EU's top diplomat rejects Russian claims of Ukrainian attack on government sites
items.description: It comes as Russia releases video which it claims shows a downed Ukrainian drone launched at one of Putin's residences.

items.title: In pictures: New Year welcomed around the world
items.description: From spectacular firework displays to chilly sea dips, nations celebrate the start of 2026.

items.title: Iran protesters try to break into government building as unrest continues
items.description: Video verified by the BBC shows a crowd breaking the gate of the governor's office in Fasa.

items.title: Man charged with murder after car hits pedestrian
items.description: Liverpool fan Ruben Nunes, 34, died at the scene of the crash on Chapel Close, the Met Police said.

items.title: UK prepares for New Year celebrations as cold weather warnings issued
items.description: The cold snap is expected to have an impact on rail services, roads and ferries as people travel for New Year's events.
